channel.title: Tutorials on Bicycle Explorers Club

item.title: Romantique Weight Savings
item.description: Everyone wants to bike lighter, it feels faster and the bike is nimble. However, if you are not racing but touring and the romance of the journey is what you are after, many go about this in the completely wrong way. The Romantiqué style of biking focuses on simplicity and classical aesthetics. Steel bikes, canvas bags and street wear clothing. I’ve been cultivating a list of items that I do not think are necessary to this style of biking.
